stripped_text: click: Place 1 power counter on IT Department. Hosted power counter: Choose a rezzed piece of ice. That ice has +1 strength until the end of the turn for each power counter (including the one spent) on IT Department.
text: [click]: Place 1 power counter on IT Department. Hosted power counter: Choose a rezzed piece of ice. That ice has +1 strength until the end of the turn for each power counter (including the one spent) on IT Department.
title: IT Department
